name: Haus Bildhauer
description:
Welcome in holiday house Bildhauer! Our house (about 110mÂ²) is situated next to the church in Ramsau. Important facilities like  outdoor swimming pool, tenniscourt, minigolf, childrens playground, skibusstop and cross country tracks are only a few mintes by feed away; Nice self contained garden, ideally for children! Parking lot is available!

children reduction on request!

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, bath, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
cosy furnished holiday house:
- living area, completly equipped with microwace, oven, coffeemachine, dish...
- livingroom with tiled stove (on request the owner will heat it for you!), Sat-TV, sitting corner
- sleepingroom with doublebed, wash basin and big wardrobe
- toilette with wash basin
- four bedded room (doublebed and 2 singlebed), 2 doublerooms (singlebeds)
- bathroom with shower and WC
